Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Increases the personal income tax credit for certain household and dependent care services necessary for gainful employment during tax years commencing on or after 2019
Summary: Increases the personal income tax credit for certain household and dependent care services necessary for gainful employment during tax years commencing on or after 2019.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the personal income tax credit for certain household and dependent care services necessary for gainful employment
